metadata.title: CVE-2019-14204 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is astack-based buffer overflow in this nfs_handler reply helper function:nfs_umountall_reply.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
